Your feedback helps us prioritize which bugs to investigate and address first.

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions
performed_via_github_app.description: Automate your workflow from idea to production

body:
Hi @FabienLariviere , 

Thank you for filing this issue. I have confirmed it, and I have a workaround. 

```
status = [Status.success.value, Status.error.value, Status.running.value]
df = pd.DataFrame(
    {
        "pipeline": ["Success", "Error", "Running"],
        "status": status,
    }
)
```

Laura

Another workaround that is a bit more elegant. @lukasmasuch has added an app with this solution as well. 

```
class Status(str, enum.Enum):
    success = "Success status"
    running = "Running status"
    error = "Error status"

    def __str__(self):
        return self.value
```

Hi @sfc-gh-lwilby @FabienLariviere ,

I came across this issue and I'm interested in contributing to it. I‚Äôve been able to replicate it on my end.

Please let me know if it's okay for me to start working on it. If so, could you assign it to me?

Thanks!
@BigBird404 Hi, I don't mind if you do this.
HI @BigBird404, thank you,  give it a shot!

issue.title: [Fix] Enum formatting not working with styled dataframes

repository.name: streamlit
repository.description: Streamlit ‚Äî A faster way to build and share data apps.

issue.body:
## Describe your changes

The issue was that after styling a streamlit dataframe with pandas styler when retrieving the "display_value" of an enum object, the result returned was the object's name rather than its actual value. This has now been corrected, and the proper value of the enum object is returned as expected.

To achieve this, a simple check was added to determine whether the object is of this specific type, and if so, its actual value is correctly returned.

## GitHub Issue Link (if applicable)
Fixes #10637 

## Testing Plan

I added a new unit test that reflects the behavior described in the issue, although in a simplified form. 
This test was failing prior to the fix.

---
